description: API endpoint for bundle deal operations

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Token for API verification using to identify your permission to access the system and execute it there

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for partner

parameters.name: bundle_deal_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a bundle deal

response_fields.name: msg
response_fields.description: indicate error type if any. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: indicate error details if any. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: bundle_deal_id
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a bundle deal

update_log.change: Optimized the merged information of Request Parameter and Response Parameter
